attributes.action: stop private landlords cashing in on the credit crunch, by pushing up private property rents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
AS A TENANT OF A PRIVATE LANDLORD,
I HAVE SEEN MY RENT GO FROM £530PCM TO A HIGH OF £740PCM IN THE LAST 3 MONTHS 
(£740 IS THE TOP LEVEL THAT HOUSING BENIFIT PAY IN THIS AREA) AND TOLD IT WAS DOWN TO THE CREDIT CRUNCH. 
I MY SELF HAVE NOT HAD A PAY RISE IN THE LAST 5 YRS , WHICH HAS MADE KEEPING A ROOF OVER MY HEAD MORE AND MORE OF A CHALLNGE. THE GOVEERMENT NEEDS TO TAKE STEPS NOW TO STOP PRIVATE LANDLORD USING THE COUNCIL HOUSING BENIFIT TO FILL THERE PROPERTY AND THERE BANK ACOUNTS, AT THE COST OF LOWER PAID WORKERS WHO CANT GET ON THE PROPERTY LADDER, CANT GET A COUNCIL HOUSE, CANT GET ANY BENIFITS TO HELP WITH THERE RENT. AND WILL BECOME THE REAL VICTIMS OF THE CREDIT CRUNCH

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
